name: update-msrs
description: Update Monthly Status Reports (MSRs) with timesheet data
author: Matthew Nicely
instructions: This skill updates Athena TO1, TO4, and TO6 Monthly Status Reports with timesheet data from TSheets. The user will provide: (1) timesheet CSV export, (2) current MSR files for TO1, TO4, and TO6, and (3) the month to update (e.g., 'Jan-26'). The skill will parse the timesheet, find the correct column in each MSR, and update all employee hours with proper formatting and colors.
